projects.name: Health Bridge
projects.description: A functional superdoc copy where normal users can book an appointment with registered doctor and chat. Made with Next.js

projects.name: X-Blogs
projects.description: A complete blog site with user authentication, made with react and expressjs

projects.name: Ask Me?
projects.description: The project represents standalone system where students and teachers can register and interact with each other. The system allows for the creation of custom and dynamic surveys by the teacher that can later be sent to the students.

projects.name: Translate app
projects.description: Android mobile app created with java. It allows for text and voice translation
